data.text: @LCally6 @JenPoulin My elder daughter works at a Starbucks. She made it through the insane beginning of the pandemic when people were fighting over pallets of toilet paper at a Target. She was masked at the Starbucks, but the customers aren't. My wife and I didn't catch it from her, surprisingly.

@DwayneFuhlhage @JenPoulin Same. Only one of us got it and she is the most careful of us all. Our district went optional and her response? “I got a mild case wearing a mask. I’ll continue wearing one”. As do we.
